data.quote: Keep your eyes on the stars and your feet on the ground.
data.author: Theodore Roosevelt

data.quote: A river cuts through the rock not because of its power but because of its persistence.
data.author: Jim Watkins

data.quote: Strength and growth come only from continuous effort and struggle.
data.author: Napolean Hill

data.quote: Motivation is what gets you started, habit it what keeps you going.
data.author: Jim Ryun

data.quote: Discipline is the bridge between goals and accomplishment.
data.author: Jim Rohn

data.quote: Don't be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
data.author: John D. Rockefeller

data.quote: Perfection is not attainable, but if we chase perfection we can catch excellence.
data.author: Vince Lombardi

data.quote: Hard work beats talent when talen doesn't work hard.
data.author: Tim Notke

data.quote: Ninety-nine percent of the failures come from people who have the habit of making excuses.
data.author: George Carver

data.quote: Be so good they can't ignore you.
data.author: Steve Martin

data.quote: Years of love have been forgot in the hatred of a minute.
data.author: Edgar Allan Poe

data.quote: I never dreamt of success, I worked for it.
data.author: Estee Lauder

data.quote: No! Try not. Do, or do not, there is no try.
data.author: Yoda

data.quote: The difference between ordinary and extraordinary is that little extra.
data.author: Jimmy Johnson

data.quote: You must expect great things of yourself before you can do them
data.author: Michael Jordan

data.quote: Accept the challenges so that you can feel the exhilaration of victory.
data.author: George S. Patton

data.quote: Those who dare to fail miserably can achieve greatly.
data.author: John F. Kennedy

data.quote: Dreams and dedication are a powerful combination.
data.author: William Longgood

data.quote: Start by doing what's necessary; then do what's possible, and suddenly you're doing the impossible.
data.author: Francis of Assisi

data.quote: If opportunity doesn't knock, build a door.
data.author: Milton Berle

data.quote: After climbing a great hill, one only finds that there are many more hills to climb.
data.author: Nelson Mandela

data.quote: Confusion of goals and perfection of means seems, in my opinion, to characterise our age.
data.author: Albert Einstein

data.quote: If you're on the right track, you'll get run over if you just sit there.
data.author: Will Rogers

data.quote: It does not do to dwell on dreams and forget to live.
data.author: J.K Rowling

data.quote: A goal should scare you a little and excite you a lot.
data.author: Joe Vitale

data.quote: Great minds discuss ideas, average minds discuss events, small minds discuss people.
data.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

data.quote: You are never too old to set a new goal or to dream a new dream.
data.author: C.S Lewis
